generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white pedestrian crossing markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The area to the right of the road, where the person is standing and outdoor tables are placed, is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: The large structures with windows and commercial storefronts in the background are buildings.
- vegetation: There are trees visible on the left side of the image and some greenery along the sidewalk.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, holding a camera.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the center-right of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible parked or driving on the street in the background.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a pedestrian crossing sign and a blue sign with a white arrow.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and those used to delineate the sidewalk.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the left edge of the sidewalk.
